text: Robert Carroll Johnson is a former American football coach and college athletics administrator. He served as the athletic director at Eastern Illinois University (1980–1988), Miami University (1989–1994), Temple University (1994–1995), and the University of Memphis (1996–2012)."Johnson leave Temple for Memphis AD job" Philadelphia Inquirer - December 30, 1995Chicago Tribune, December 16, 1988 In November 2009, Johnson contract with Memphis was extended to run through June 2013."R.C. Johnson to remain Memphis' AD through 2012" By Phil Stukenborg November 17, 2008 The Commercial Appeal In November 2011, Johnson announced his plans to leave the athletic director's position on June 30, 2012. He will be paid beyond that date as per his contract extension. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Eastern Illinois Panthers athletic directors Category:Iowa Hawkeyes football coaches Category:Memphis Tigers athletic directors Category:Miami RedHawks athletic directors Category:Minnesota State Mavericks football coaches Category:Northern Iowa Panthers football coaches Category:Temple Owls athletic directors Category:Youngstown State Penguins football coaches Category:People from Ottawa, Illinois Category:Educators from Illinois
title: R. C. Johnson
